snippet: The operation appears intended to send a message similar to the so-called anticorruption campaign promoted by President Xi Jinping.
abstract: Chinese government has widened a crackdown on prostitution, gambling and drug use to include major provinces across the country.

byline.contributor: Mia Li and Chen Jiehao contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The operation appears intended to send a message similar to the so-called anticorruption campaign promoted by President Xi Jinping.

headline.main: Chinese Officials Widen Campaign Against Vices
headline.print_headline: Chinese Officials Widen Campaign Against Vices
